summary: The story of the Russian-born, Wisconsin-raised woman who rose to become Israel's prime minister in the late 1960s and early 1970s.
cast: Ingrid Bergman|Ned Beatty|Franklin Cover|Judy Davis|Anne Jackson|Robert Loggia|Leonard Nimoy|Jack Thompson|Anthony Bate|Ron Berglas|Bruce Boa|David de Keyser|Barry Foster|Nigel Hawthorne|Louis Mahoney|Yossi Graber|Tuvia Tavi|Yael Friedman|Yosef Shiloach|Avi Yakir|Shmuel Atzmon|Amos Mokadi|Esty Kusevitsky|Eiran Baniel|Shai Schwartz|Meirav Gary|Aviva Ger|Yitzhak Ne'eman|Alexander Peleg|Noa Baniel|Yehuda Efroni|Gideon Shemer|Gabi Amrani|Oded Teomi|Natan Cogan|Shlomo Bar-Shavit|Gila Almagor|Ilan Dar|Fred Weisgal|Ori Levy|Derek Lyons|Mosko Alkalai|Terrence Beasor|Rolf Brin|Tiffany Brissette|Ezra Danin|Dave Fineberg|Yehuda Fuchs|Yoram Gal|Shimon Lev-Ari|Oded Levy|Doron Nesher|Rivka Neuman|Shmuel Wolf
title: Una mujer llamada Golda
